{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''azra''' is [[Adûnaic]] for "[[Sea]]". Plurals subj. ''azrîya'', coll. ''azar''
==Etymology==
[[Sundocarmë|Root]] AZRA, perhaps from an ancient radical *Z'R, ultimately related to [[Khuzdul]] *Z-R (cf. ''[[zâram]]'')

==Cognates==
*[[Khuzdul]]: ''[[zâram]]'' (lake, mere)
==See also==
*[[Azrubêl]] ([[Eärendil]])
==Other versions==
''azra'' once meant star<ref>{{HM|PM}}, [[The Problem of Ros]]</ref>
